text: @taradublinrocks @reedgalen @TimMurtaugh @parscale You’ve never done a decent thing in you’re life @GovAbbott, so I’m not surprised you’re going to let @POTUS hold a rally in TX even as our #COVID19 #’s continue to rage. 👏🙄
